description:
Class 2-A meet up after the school festival at an okonomiyaki restaurant. Ishikawa plans a surprise party.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuuketsuki-chan to Hanseikai / Kyuuketsuki-chan no Surprise Keikaku
Li`l Miss Vampire and the After-Party / Li`l Miss Vampire`s Surprise Plan
吸血鬼ちゃんと反省会 / 吸血鬼ちゃんのサプライズ計画
